price: 27. Markayse arkaan (cadaabka Ilaahay) oo ku soo dhow, waxaa xumaan wejiyada gaalada, waxaana lagu odhan: Waa kan waxaad u yeedhan jirteen (in la idiin soo dedejiyo oo cadaab ah).
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ زُلۡفَةٗ سِيٓـَٔتۡ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā ra-awhu zul'fatan sīat wujūhu alladhīna kafarū waqīla hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi taddaʿūna
